project.description:
Yocto Sumo s5p4418-daudio-ref weekly build
s5p6818-avn-ref weekly build 직후 trigger 됨. <!-- Managed by Jenkins Job Builder -->

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
echo "***************************************" echo " Jenkins - Yocto environment setup " echo "***************************************"
export LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8 export LANG=en_US.UTF-8 export LANGUAGE=en_US.UTF-8
echo "*****************************************" echo " Yocto Sumo daudio-ref qt (s5p4418) " echo "*****************************************" ./tools/build.sh s5p4418-daudio-ref qt

#!/bin/bash
cd yocto/out
echo "************************************" echo " clean old dirs " echo "************************************" rm -rf result-*-qt*-weekly.tar.gz rm -rf result-*-qt*-weekly
echo "************************************" echo " unnecessary .ext4 file remove" echo "************************************" rm -rf result-s5p4418-daudio-ref-qt/*.ext4
echo "************************************" echo " BUILD-INFO.txt copy to result dir " echo "************************************" cp ${JENKINS_HOME}/snapshot_build_info/BUILD-INFO.txt result-s5p4418-daudio-ref-qt/
echo "************************************" echo " Compress result dirs " echo "************************************" tar cvzf result-s5p4418-daudio-ref-qt.tar.gz result-s5p4418-daudio-ref-qt/*
echo "************************************" echo " Rename tarballs " echo "************************************" mv result-s5p4418-daudio-ref-qt.tar.gz result-s5p4418-yocto-sumo-qt-daudio-ref-`date +%Y%m%d`-weekly.tar.gz
echo "************************************" echo " Rename result dirs " echo "************************************" mv result-s5p4418-daudio-ref-qt result-s5p4418-yocto-sumo-qt-daudio-ref-`date +%Y%m%d`-weekly
